Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Establishes a task force to study how to incentivize individuals in the state of New York to become pilots
Summary: Establishes a task force to study how to incentivize individuals in the state of New York to become pilots; looks at retirement trends, the effect of high-stress scheduling and the cost among other things.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish a task force to study how to incentivize individuals in the state of New York to become pilots
